sections.summary: it product manager bringing 13 years in it project management. skilled in installation, configuration, migration and implementation of server platforms. highlights enterprise platforms certified information security manager consumer software specialist self-directed project tracking budgeting and resource management hardware and software upgrade planning end-to-end product lifecycles product requirements documentation collaborative accomplishments reduced the incidence of it issues by 95% globally by leading a testing initiative improvement program.
